title: Lilium was once a promising 'air taxi' startup worth billions. Now it's on the brink of insolvency
content: German aerospace startup Lilium faces insolvency if it doesn't raise emergency funding from the state government for the southeastern state of Bavaria.
summary: German aerospace startup Lilium faces insolvency if it doesn't raise emergency funding from the state government for the southeastern state of Bavaria.

title: 'Time to be a little bit cautious': Norway's $1.8 trillion wealth fund issues stock market warning
content: Norges Bank Investment Management (NBIM), one of the world's largest investors, says risks are tilted to the downside for global stock markets.
summary: Norges Bank Investment Management (NBIM), one of the world's largest investors, says risks are tilted to the downside for global stock markets.

title: Russia says it has no intention of abandoning Iran as it faces Israel's wrath
content: "We are developing cooperation with Iran in a variety of areas. We intend to do this further," Kremlin Press Secretary Dmitry Peskov told CNBC Tuesday.
summary: "We are developing cooperation with Iran in a variety of areas. We intend to do this further," Kremlin Press Secretary Dmitry Peskov told CNBC Tuesday.

title: Trump tariffs likely to lead to higher U.S. interest rates, head of Institute of International Finance says
content: "The assumption is you'll have higher inflation, higher interest rates than you would have in the absence of those tariffs," said IIF CEO Tim Adams.
summary: "The assumption is you'll have higher inflation, higher interest rates than you would have in the absence of those tariffs," said IIF CEO Tim Adams.

title: German court rules against Deutsche Bank in Postbank acquisition lawsuit
content: Deutsche Bank said it will now analyze the judgement and noted it has booked provisions covering all outstanding claims by the plaintiffs, including interest accrued to date.
summary: Deutsche Bank said it will now analyze the judgement and noted it has booked provisions covering all outstanding claims by the plaintiffs, including interest accrued to date.

title: Qualcomm shares fall 5% after report of Arm threat to scrap key license in escalating dispute
content: Qualcomm shares fell in premarket trade after Bloomberg reported that British chip designer Arm is looking to scrap a key license for the U.S. firm.
summary: Qualcomm shares fell in premarket trade after Bloomberg reported that British chip designer Arm is looking to scrap a key license for the U.S. firm.

title: Deutsche Bank shares shed 3% as lender's swing back to profit fails to impress
content: The partial release of 440 million euros of litigation provisions in the third quarter helped boost profit, Deutsche Bank said.
summary: The partial release of 440 million euros of litigation provisions in the third quarter helped boost profit, Deutsche Bank said.

title: Crypto firm Circle expects the UK to introduce stablecoin laws in 'months, not years'
content: "I think we're within months, not years" of formal U.K. stablecoin laws being introduced, crypto firm Circle's top policy executive told CNBC.
summary: "I think we're within months, not years" of formal U.K. stablecoin laws being introduced, crypto firm Circle's top policy executive told CNBC.

title: ‘They want something different’: Two reports predict a big shift in travel behavior in 2025
content: Trend reports from Expedia and Booking.com show vacationers are forgoing splashy trips to global hot spots in favor of lesser-known places.
summary: Trend reports from Expedia and Booking.com show vacationers are forgoing splashy trips to global hot spots in favor of lesser-known places.

title: 'On vacation every single day': I left the U.S. to live in Vietnam and only need to work 15 hours a week
content: Kavi Vu, 33, moved to Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam in August 2023. Today, she lives on about $1,500 a month, according to documents reviewed.
summary: Kavi Vu, 33, moved to Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam in August 2023. Today, she lives on about $1,500 a month, according to documents reviewed.

title: Tokyo Metro shares surge 45% on debut after Japan's largest IPO in six years
content: The IPO offered 2.32 billion shares for a price of 1,200 yen apiece, valuing the offering at 348.6 billion yen ($2.3 billion)
summary: The IPO offered 2.32 billion shares for a price of 1,200 yen apiece, valuing the offering at 348.6 billion yen ($2.3 billion)

title: China and Russia's 'profound' ties will not change despite 'turbulent' geopolitical landscape, Xi tells Putin
content: Putin called the partnership "one of the main stabilizing factors in the international arena."
summary: Putin called the partnership "one of the main stabilizing factors in the international arena."

title: A 'tidal wave' of natural gas supply — the biggest yet — will reshape global markets, says RBC Capital
content: The expansion is likely to lead to a state of oversupply by the end of 2026, analysts such as RBC's Anan Dhanani have projected.
summary: The expansion is likely to lead to a state of oversupply by the end of 2026, analysts such as RBC's Anan Dhanani have projected.

title: CNBC Daily Open: The S&P could continue its ascent despite pausing
content: With elections and high valuations, the path ahead for markets may be rocky. But the S&P might persist in scaling an ever-ascending mountain range.
summary: With elections and high valuations, the path ahead for markets may be rocky. But the S&P might persist in scaling an ever-ascending mountain range.

title: TSMC denies U.S. is probing the company after report suggests blacklisted Huawei is using its chips
content: TSMC has denied a report that the U.S. is investigating its dealings with Huawei, following news that one of its chips has been found in a Huawei product.
summary: TSMC has denied a report that the U.S. is investigating its dealings with Huawei, following news that one of its chips has been found in a Huawei product.

title: IMF warns on China's property market worsening as it cuts country's growth outlook
content: In a report published Tuesday, the IMF trimmed its forecast for growth in China for this year to 4.8%, 0.2 percentage points lower than in its July projection.
summary: In a report published Tuesday, the IMF trimmed its forecast for growth in China for this year to 4.8%, 0.2 percentage points lower than in its July projection.

title: Starbucks shares slide after coffee chain says sales fell again, suspends outlook
content: The company's same-store sales slid for the third consecutive quarter, fueled by a 10% tumble in traffic to its North American stores.
summary: The company's same-store sales slid for the third consecutive quarter, fueled by a 10% tumble in traffic to its North American stores.

title: IMF says global fight against inflation is 'almost won' but warns of rising risks
content: The IMF projects global headline inflation to fall to 3.5% by the end of 2025.
summary: The IMF projects global headline inflation to fall to 3.5% by the end of 2025.

title: SAP boss warns against regulating AI, says Europe risks falling behind U.S., China
content: Christian Klein, head of German software giant SAP, says Europe risks falling behind the U.S. and China if it ends up overregulating the AI sector.
summary: Christian Klein, head of German software giant SAP, says Europe risks falling behind the U.S. and China if it ends up overregulating the AI sector.

title: World’s largest sovereign wealth fund posts $76 billion in quarterly profit as interest rates fall
content: Norway's gigantic sovereign wealth fund on Tuesday reported third-quarter profit of 835 billion Norwegian kroner ($76.3 billion).
summary: Norway's gigantic sovereign wealth fund on Tuesday reported third-quarter profit of 835 billion Norwegian kroner ($76.3 billion).

title: Russia pushes 'new world order' agenda as it hosts beefed-up BRICS summit
content: Russia is rolling out the red carpet to its allies on Tuesday as it hosts the latest BRICS summit in a show of strength to the West.
summary: Russia is rolling out the red carpet to its allies on Tuesday as it hosts the latest BRICS summit in a show of strength to the West.

title: McDonald's shares fall after CDC says E. coli outbreak linked to Quarter Pounders
content: The CDC said an E. coli outbreak linked to McDonald's Quarter Pounder burgers has led to 10 hospitalizations and one death.
summary: The CDC said an E. coli outbreak linked to McDonald's Quarter Pounder burgers has led to 10 hospitalizations and one death.

title: Paul Tudor Jones says market reckoning on spending is coming after election: 'We are going to be broke'
content: Hedge fund manager Paul Tudor Jones told CNBC that government spending could cause a major sell-off in the bond market.
summary: Hedge fund manager Paul Tudor Jones told CNBC that government spending could cause a major sell-off in the bond market.

title: Former Abercrombie CEO Mike Jeffries charged with sex trafficking, interstate prostitution
content: Abercrombie & Fitch and its former CEO Mike Jeffries were sued last year for allegedly operating a sex trafficking ring that targeted would-be male models.
summary: Abercrombie & Fitch and its former CEO Mike Jeffries were sued last year for allegedly operating a sex trafficking ring that targeted would-be male models.

title: Qatar Airways partners with Elon Musk’s Starlink for high-speed Wi-Fi milestone
content: Qatar Airways launched Tuesday its inaugural Boeing 777 flight equipped with Elon Musk's Starlink internet, paving the way for a new era of in-flight connectivity across its entire fleet by next year.
summary: Qatar Airways launched Tuesday its inaugural Boeing 777 flight equipped with Elon Musk's Starlink internet, paving the way for a new era of in-flight connectivity across its entire fleet by next year.

title: GM stock has best day since 2020 after automaker tops Wall Street's third-quarter expectations, raises guidance
content: GM's quarterly report comes just two weeks after an investor day in which the company indicated its earnings strength is expected to continue into next year.
summary: GM's quarterly report comes just two weeks after an investor day in which the company indicated its earnings strength is expected to continue into next year.

title: HSBC embarks on major restructuring, names first female CFO
content: HSBC has unveiled a major overhaul, announcing a new geographic setup, consolidated operations and a new CFO — the lender's first female finance chief.
summary: HSBC has unveiled a major overhaul, announcing a new geographic setup, consolidated operations and a new CFO — the lender's first female finance chief.

title: More startups are being spun out of Klarna than any other European fintech unicorn
content: Alumni from Klarna have gone on to create 62 new startups — more than any other fintech unicorn in Europe, according to a new report from VC firm Accel.
summary: Alumni from Klarna have gone on to create 62 new startups — more than any other fintech unicorn in Europe, according to a new report from VC firm Accel.

title: Hyundai Motor India's shares drop 7% on trading debut after record IPO
content: Hyundai Motor India shares fell 7% on their trading debut Tuesday after a record $3.3 billion initial public offering.
summary: Hyundai Motor India shares fell 7% on their trading debut Tuesday after a record $3.3 billion initial public offering.

title: Economists see UK cutting interest rates more substantially as inflation pressures ease
content: Economists at Goldman Sachs forecast the Bank of England's key rate falling to 2.75% by November, well below market pricing.
summary: Economists at Goldman Sachs forecast the Bank of England's key rate falling to 2.75% by November, well below market pricing.
